LanguageData.Bandagekitcrude.label: Crude Bandage Kit
LanguageData.Bandagekitcrude.description: A pack of makeshift bandages. Looks bad, probably bad for your wounds. Good for stopping bleeding but nothing more.
LanguageData.Bandagekit.label: Bandage Kit
LanguageData.Bandagekit.description: A pack of bandages made from cloth. Less potent than medical kits.
LanguageData.Herbmedicine.label: basic medicine kit
LanguageData.Herbmedicine.description: A pack of mix herbs. Less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals. \n\nMade from aloe and cloth.
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.label: Antibiotics
LanguageData.MedicalDrink.description: A concentrated extract of Healroot and some hops. Tastes awful but boosts the immune system.
LanguageData.MushroomTincture.label: mushroom tincture
LanguageData.MushroomTincture.description: A concentrated extract from mushrooms. A good, natural medicine source.
LanguageData.HealrootTincture.label: healroot tincture
LanguageData.HealrootTincture.description: A concentrated extract from healroot. A good, natural medicine source.
